meta.job_title: Registered Nurse (RN) NICU - Neonatal Intensive Care

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care in the NICU (Neonatal Intensive Care Unit) setting.
Utilize critical thinking to assess and manage the health of newborns and infants.
Communicate effectively with families, physicians, and other healthcare team members.
Work collaboratively with other healthcare professionals to provide comprehensive care.
Demonstrate attention to detail and empathy in caring for neonatal patients.

education_certification.credential: Current RN license in the state of Florida
